closed_reason: Ported deps and status commands to Cobra. Created deps.go with --json flag using cobra.ExactArgs(1). Created status.go with --json flag using cobra.NoArgs. Added splitLines helper to status.go package for JSON output. Added to Cobra routing in main.go switch statement. Both commands tested and working correctly.
description: Migrate deps (show dependency graph) and status (show epic status summary) commands to Cobra.
title: Port deps and status commands to Cobra
